properties.desc: man walking down the middle of the sidewalk. didn't attempt to move to a side.
man walking down the middle of the sidewalk on the phone. oblivious.

ass wipe riding his bike on the sidewalk (no mask) turns the corner right in front of us and just stops. he doesn't move at all and we can't get around him because he has blocked our path to the road.
man carrying baby on his front purposefully walks within 4 feet of us.
we moved to avoid a woman walking a dog and a man who had previously been behind kept straight on walking. didn't allow enough space for us or for the woman with the dog.
man and woman walking side by side. didn't move at all.
